com.github.peterbencze.serritor.internal.stats

Class StatsCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.peterbencze.serritor.internal.stats.StatsCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class StatsCounter
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Accumulates statistics during the operation of the crawler.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StatsCounter()
      Creates a StatsCounter instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getFilteredCrawlDepthLimitExceedingRequestCount()
      Returns the number of filtered crawl depth limit exceeding requests.
      int getFilteredDuplicateRequestCount()
      Returns the number of filtered duplicate requests.
      int getFilteredOffsiteRequestCount()
      Returns the number of filtered offsite requests.
      int getNetworkErrorCount()
      Returns the number of network errors that occurred during the crawl.
      int getNonHtmlResponseCount()
      Returns the number of responses received with non-HTML content.
      int getPageLoadTimeoutCount()
      Returns the number of page load timeouts that occurred during the crawl.
      int getProcessedCrawlCandidateCount()
      Returns the number of processed crawl candidates.
      int getRemainingCrawlCandidateCount()
      Returns the number of remaining crawl candidates.
      int getRequestRedirectCount()
      Returns the number of request redirects that occurred during the crawl.
      int getResponseErrorCount()
      Returns the number of responses received during the crawl, whose HTTP status code indicated error (4xx or 5xx).
      int getResponseSuccessCount()
      Returns the number of responses received during the crawl, whose HTTP status code indicated success (2xx).
      StatsCounterSnapshot getSnapshot()
      Returns a snapshot of this counter's values.
      void recordCrawlDepthLimitExceedingRequest()
      Records a crawl depth limit exceeding request.
      void recordDuplicateRequest()
      Records a duplicate request.
      void recordNetworkError()
      Records a network error.
      void recordNonHtmlResponse()
      Records the receipt of a response with non-HTML content.
      void recordOffsiteRequest()
      Records an offsite request.
      void recordPageLoadTimeout()
      Records a page load timeout.
      void recordRemainingCrawlCandidate()
      Records an added crawl candidate.
      void recordRequestRedirect()
      Records a request redirect.
      void recordResponseError()
      Records the receipt of a response whose HTTP status code indicates error (4xx or 5xx).
      void recordResponseSuccess()
      Records the receipt of a response whose HTTP status code indicates success (2xx).
      void reset()
      Resets stats counter to its initial state.

        public void recordRemainingCrawlCandidate()
        Records an added crawl candidate. This should be called when a crawl candidate is added to the crawl frontier.

        Returns:
        the number of network errors that occurred during the crawl

      • recordNetworkError

        public void recordNetworkError()
        Records a network error. This should be called when a network error occurs while trying to fulfill a request.

      • getFilteredDuplicateRequestCount

        public int getFilteredDuplicateRequestCount()
        Returns the number of filtered duplicate requests.
        Returns:
        the number of filtered duplicate requests

      • recordDuplicateRequest

        public void recordDuplicateRequest()
        Records a duplicate request. This should be called when the duplicate request filter is enabled and a duplicate request is encountered.

      • getFilteredOffsiteRequestCount

        public int getFilteredOffsiteRequestCount()
        Returns the number of filtered offsite requests.
        Returns:
        the number of filtered offsite requests

      • recordOffsiteRequest

        public void recordOffsiteRequest()
        Records an offsite request. This should be called when the offsite request filter is enabled and an offsite request is encountered.

      • getFilteredCrawlDepthLimitExceedingRequestCount

        public int getFilteredCrawlDepthLimitExceedingRequestCount()
        Returns the number of filtered crawl depth limit exceeding requests.
        Returns:
        the number of filtered crawl depth limit exceeding requests

      • recordCrawlDepthLimitExceedingRequest

        public void recordCrawlDepthLimitExceedingRequest()
        Records a crawl depth limit exceeding request. This should be called when a crawl depth limit is set and the request's crawl depth exceeds this limit.

        public StatsCounterSnapshot getSnapshot()
        Returns a snapshot of this counter's values.
